"Dummy Message": "That's enough! That was great! You really showed me how hard you work!"
"...Hmm. Your performance was a little lacking!"
"But your spirit took you right to the finish line! That's all ARKS need!"
"You didn't win and you don't get the exhibition match, but your spirit proved itself!"
"Now, head on home! Everyone is waiting for you!"
"A flawless result! This was a brilliant plan! I'm a genius!"
"Well, it was really down to your effort as participants!"
"I've prepared a special reward, just for you!"
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"Who?"
"Oh, I think I've heard that name before..."
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look here, Claris Claes, this is about the participants, so can you please read it properly in future?"
"Wait, Huey! ...What about me?"
"Hm? Do you have something to say other than congratulations?"
"No, that's not it..."
"Ahahahahahaa! Don't worry about the details!"
"I felt it when we crossed blades! You have a fine spirit! So the small details don't matter!"
"Keep justice in your heart, and things will work out alright! Don't worry about being a little reckless!"
"Was that all you wanted to ask? Well then!"
"...He's all kinds of unusual, that one. I see I've got a way to go yet."
"Well then, here we are. It was fun teaming up. See you around."
"I think I've heard that name somewhere before..."
"Next, the pair of the Force Marlu and the Hunter Ohza!"
"But it seems like the rumored Information Sisters are also working hard!"
"Who?"
"Look, Claris Claes. I know that becoming an adult can be a sad thing. But sometimes we need to follow the script."
"For now, let's read up about the participants."
"Ash"
"Su"
"Rupika"
"Gilliam"
